concept.definition: A group of products and/or Services, amount ar the summary or detail level products and services.

description: This value set includes sample Item Type codes.
name: Item Type Codes

text.div:
Item Type Codes

This value set includes sample Item Type codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/ex-claimitemtype defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
group GroupA group of products and/or Services, amount ar the summary or detail level products and services.
product ProductA billed product line item.
service ServiceA billed service line item.
